Package index

Ramp functions and tiepoint data

Primary functions to create color ramps.

expand()
Create color ramp palette from fixed, color-tiepoint objects
trimramp()
Trimming a calibrated color ramp object.

Plotting applications

Functions to visualize color ramps.

plot(<calibramp>)
Visualize a calibrated color ramp
colorpoints()
Colored points
ramplegend()
Create a heatmap legend based on calibrated color ramp values

Example data

Color ramp palettes, ramp tiepoint data.frames and expanded calibrated ramps.

topos
Topographic color palettes with tiepoints
paleomap
Topographic gradient map color map of PALEOMAP project
gradinv()
Color gradient ramps

Auxilliary functions

Example data for ramp tiepoints and some color palettes.

limit()
Limit range of values in a SpatRaster object
